<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#a1e4ac7b073d744d43f3cb1a3660c03c3">addTopLevelLoop</a>(ColumnLoopInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ColBody =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">      CreateLoop(Start, End, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt64(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#a875ddebc5962ba98bd7e090f5951687e">NumColumns</a>), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt64(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#abea2744097436ef6ca24ccb940193ad3">TileSize</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;cols&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, DTU, ColumnLoopInfo, LI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#a3159a958f6b4f8b6d76d34964649237c">ColumnLoop</a>.Latch = ColBody-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;RowBody =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">      CreateLoop(ColBody, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#a3159a958f6b4f8b6d76d34964649237c">ColumnLoop</a>.Latch, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt64(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#a4d7f66cf9378e5d805eb7487829c99fd">NumRows</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">                 <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt64(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#abea2744097436ef6ca24ccb940193ad3">TileSize</a>), </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;rows&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, DTU, RowLoopInfo, LI);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;InnerBody =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">      CreateLoop(RowBody, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#a3e06087e90c0e4057bdc3fe3b0ec5904">RowLoop</a>.Latch, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getInt64(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/tileinfo/#a21b1735a7e34df5c9bb4f706fc6cfadc">NumInner</a>),</Highlight></CodeLine>
